messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
http://code.google.com/p/go/

Thank you for fixing this. As this is example code, would I be able to
convince you to extend your patch a little and convert this code into
an ExampleNewReader example?

Cheers

Dave

On Tue, Apr 17, 2012 at 2:33 PM,  <qyzhai@gmail.com> wrote:
> Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> http://code.google.com/p/go/
>
>
> Description:
> compress/zlib: minor fixes
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/6058043/
>
> Affected files:
>  M src/pkg/compress/zlib/reader.go
>
>
> Index: src/pkg/compress/zlib/reader.go
> ===================================================================
> --- a/src/pkg/compress/zlib/reader.go
> +++ b/src/pkg/compress/zlib/reader.go
> @@ -11,7 +11,7 @@
>  to a buffer:
>
>        var b bytes.Buffer
> -       w, err := zlib.NewWriter(&b)
> +       w := zlib.NewWriter(&b)
>        w.Write([]byte("hello, world\n"))
>        w.Close()
>
>
>

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, dave@cheney.net (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.
LGTM. Thank you for adding some nice examples.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, dave@cheney.net (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

ping

On Wed, Apr 18, 2012 at 8:03 AM, <dave@cheney.net> wrote:

> LGTM. Thank you for adding some nice examples.
>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/**6058043/<http://codereview.appspot.com/6058043/>
>

Assuming there is no more discussion, I'll submit this today.
